name: The Powerpuff Girls: Defenders of Townsville
name_original: The Powerpuff Girls: Defenders of Townsville
description:
The Powerpuff Girls: Defenders of Townsville is an arcade game developed by Radiangames. It came out on 14-03-2014. Cartoon Network Games published the game. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
The Powerpuff Girls: Defenders of Townsville is available on PC.
